name: AI Downloader
title: AI Downloader

api_list.name: Get any source
api_list.description: This will output the raw result from our search AI, useful when the other endpoints don't return any value.

optional_parameters.name: reverse
optional_parameters.description: This allows to return a reversed list of the links provided by the AI.

api_list.name: Get audio from source
api_list.description: Using AI, we will try to get any audio source possible.

optional_parameters.name: reverse
optional_parameters.description: This allows to return a reversed list of the links provided by the AI.

api_list.name: Get video from source
api_list.description: Using AI, we will try to get any video source possible.

optional_parameters.name: reverse
optional_parameters.description: This allows to return a reversed list of the links provided by the AI.
